content: शूलः --लं [शूल्-क] {@--1@} A sharp or pointed weapon, pike, dart, spear, lance. {@--2@} The trident of Śiva. {@--3@} An iron-spit (for roasting meat upon); शूले संस्कृतं शूल्यम्; <ab>cf.</ab> अयः शूल. {@--4@} A stake for impaling criminals; (बिभ्रत्) स्कंधेन शूलं हृदयेन शोकं <ls>Mk. 10. 21</ls>, <ls>Ku. 5. 73.</ls> {@--5@} Any acute or sharp pain. {@--6@} Colic. {@--7@} Gout, rheumatism. {@--8@} Death. {@--9@} A banner, an ensign. (शूलाकृ ‘to roast on an iron-spit’).
